articles.title: American Citizen Punished in DPRK
articles.content:
American Citizen Punished in DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- A trial of Pae Jun Ho, an American citizen, took place held at the Supreme Court of the DPRK on April 30. He was arrested while committing hostile acts against the DPRK after entering Rason City as a tourist on Nov. 3 last year.
					 The Supreme Court sentenced him to 15 years of compulsory labor for this crime.

articles.title: NRI Holds U.S. and S. Korea Responsible for Danger of Nuclear War on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
NRI Holds U.S., S. Korea Responsible for Danger of Nuclear War on Korean Peninsula 
						
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The National Reunification Institute (NRI) on Wednesday made public a white paper accusing the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces of pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a nuclear war.
					 The white paper said:
					
					 The U.S. and its lackeys, south Korean warmongers have been responsible for all incidents of military confrontation that pushed the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war and stunned the world for several decades. To cite a few examples, they provoked the Korean War in the 1950s and there were the incidents of the U.S. spy warship Pueblo and the U.S. spy plane EC-121 in the 1960s, the Panmunjom incident in the 1970s, the armed skirmishes in the West Sea of Korea and the Yonphyong Island shelling incident in the subsequent period.
					
					 The U.S.-led hostile forces prodded the UN Security Council into fabricating an unreasonable "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK over its legitimate satellite launch for peaceful purposes at the end of last year. This was a heinous provocation perpetrated in wanton violation of its dignity and sovereignty.
					
					 To cope with this, the DPRK, as it had already warned, decisively countered the provocation of the U.S., the south Korean puppet group and other hostile forces by conducting the third underground nuclear test.
					
					 Much upset by it, the U.S. and south Korean puppet group got frantic in their moves to cook up additional UN "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					
					 By putting in motion its hand-raising machine, the U.S. cooked up the UN "resolution on sanctions" 2094 against the DPRK in March, 2013.
					
					 This was more provocative than the last UN "resolution" 2087. It was nothing but a vicious document of blackmail and a de facto declaration of war as it calls for isolating and stifling the DPRK by totally blockading its sky, land and seas. 
					
					 Timed to coincide with the fabrication of the UN "resolution on sanctions", the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers staged the large-scale Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises in south Korea since March last.
					
					 These drills were staged according to such extremely dangerous war scenarios as OPLAN 5027 and OPLAN 5029 which are aimed to mount a surprise attack upon the DPRK and occupy it.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean warmongers didn't conceal that the main aim of such saber-rattling was to mount a preemptive nuclear attack upon the DPRK and a precision strike upon its headquarters.
					
					 They went the lengths of staging mock drills to destroy the symbols of the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK after working out a vicious plan for the operations.
					
					 The spokesman for the U.S. Department of Defense, the commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea and the south Korean military openly blustered that the drills were aimed "to demonstrate the capability for a nuclear attack upon the DPRK", and "to mount a preemptive strike upon the strategic bases of the north and to strike its bases of counteractions, supporting forces and even commanding forces in case it launches counterattacks" and "they were staged under the simulated conditions of not only a local war but a total war".
					
					 Meanwhile, the south Korean puppet forces and the U.S. inked "the plan for jointly countering the provocation of a local war," making the U.S. forces' involvement in the inter-Korean military conflicts an established fact. They staged drills for implementing the plan for a local war and an all-out war and various war scenarios for provocation in five islands in the West Sea of Korea, widely opening them to public.
					
					 The U.S. military and the brass-hats of the south Korean puppet army let loose a spate of such outbursts that "they are simulating the worst scenarios and getting ready to cope with them", "the drills might go over to the phase of actual punishment" and "there is no limit to the scope of retaliatory punishment". They went the lengths of crying out for "wiping out the north government from the surface of the earth".
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers are the arch criminals who escalated the tension and brought the danger of a nuclear war to the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Accuses S. Korean Regime of Its Humiliating Action
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Accuses S. Korean Regime of Its Humiliating Action
						
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) issued its information bulletin No. 1034 on Thursday denouncing the south Korean authorities for offering the upkeep of the U.S. forces in south Korea and even pocket money to them.
					 It was recently disclosed in south Korea that the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea were squandering a fabulous amount of money given by the south Korean puppet regime under the pretext of "sharing defence expenses" for the preparations for a war against the DPRK, and using them as pocket money, sparking off a big furor.
					
					 The recently disclosed crime of the U.S. forces is lashing south Koreans and all other fellow countrymen into great fury, the information bulletin said, and went on:
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime has offered a fabulous amount of money collected from the people as taxes to the U.S. forces every year in the pretext of sharing their upkeep from 1989 and south Korea's share of the expenses is steadily increasing under the pressure of the U.S.
					
					 Even according to data opened to public by the puppet regime, the amount of the money accumulated by the U.S. forces in south Korea as shared expenses for upkeep surpassed 1 300 billion won as of the end of 2010.
					
					 The pro-U.S. lackeys of south Korea are imploring for permanent U.S. military presence in south Korea while offering upkeep and even pocket money to the beast-like occupation forces, aggressors hell-bent on murder, plunder and rape, lording it over south Korea.
					
					 The puppet regime is committing such humiliating acts, not content with acting a war servant while standing in confrontation with fellow countrymen and currying favor with its American master, calling for closer alliance with the U.S. This is a shame on the Korean nation.
					
					 People from all walks of life in south Korea should turn out as one in the struggle to force the U.S. imperialist aggressor troops, the root cause of all misfortunes and sufferings, withdraw from south Korea at an early date and make a clean sweep of the pro-U.S. lackeys.

articles.title: Socialist Emulation for Rice Transplanting Called for
articles.content:
Socialist Emulation for Rice Transplanting Called for
						
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The agricultural workers in Anak County, South Hwanghae Province Thursday met at the Oguk Cooperative Farm and called upon the organizations of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and agricultural workers across the country to launch a socialist emulation for increased grain production by qualitatively finishing rice transplanting in good time this year.
					 Present there were Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the C.C., the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea, officials concerned and agricultural workers in the county.
					
					 At the meeting a reporter and speakers vowed to wage a dynamic drive to increase the grain production, bearing in mind the intention of the WPK, which set agriculture as the main orientation for economic construction this year.
					
					 A program of the socialist emulation for increased grain production was announced at the meeting.

articles.title: Agro-forestry Management Activities Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Agro-forestry Management Activities Brisk in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- Agro-forestry management activities are gaining momentum in Suan County, North Hwanghae Province, the DPRK.
					 As one of the mountainous areas, the county has limited arable land. In the past it had been dependent on mountains to solve the shortage of food, fuel and timber, causing decreased forests.
					
					 Under such circumstances, it began applying the method of agro-forestry management to mountain plots.
					
					 It organized three sloping land user teams in the county town with housewives and old people for the management on trial. Afterwards, such teams were organized in other parts of the county.
					
					 The teams raise saplings of good species of trees in nurseries built in mountains.
					
					 Forests were created in accordance with tree species. And areas suitable for crop cultivation were chosen for the agro-forestry management.
					
					Firewood areas were fixed in a rational way and natural and artificial grasslands appeared in pastures.
					
					 The agro-forestry management method has reduced soil erosion 50 to 70 percent in the county.
					
					 The county plans to apply the method to all parts of the county to turn the area into thick woodland in the near future.

articles.title: New Kind of Paddy-rice Cultivator Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Kind of Paddy-rice Cultivator Developed in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The Institute of Agricultural Mechanization in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has recently developed a new kind of multi-functional paddy-rice cultivator.
					 The cultivator consists of weeding, manuring and spraying parts. Especially, it ploughs soil while weeding, which helps prevent root scab. Spraying part is installed in the front, making it possible to evenly spray liquid agrochemicals.
					
					 The machine can be made by mechanized work teams or repair sub-work teams of co-op farms, as it costs low with easy structures.
					
					 It has already proved effective in farms in Anju area, south Phyongan Province.

articles.title: Minju Joson Condemns U.S. for Mocking at World
articles.content:
Minju Joson Condemns U.S. for Mocking at World
						
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- High-ranking authorities of the U.S. claimed that the DPRK's position toward dialogue is "unacceptable" and that in order to have "trustworthy and sincere" negotiations it is necessary for "north Korea to show its sincere attitude toward the issue of abandoning the nuclear weapons".
					 Minju Joson Thursday says in a bylined article in this regard:
					
					 This is a brigandish assertion of those accustomed to high-handed and arbitrary practices.
					
					 The U.S. attitude toward the DPRK's position showed that the U.S. is not interested in dialogue with the DPRK and fully revealed its intention to stifle the latter militarily through its continued hostile policy.
					
					 In fact, it is the U.S. that compelled the DPRK to build nuclear force and destroyed the denuclearization process on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. has urged the DPRK to accept "its demand for denuclearization" and show the "will for abandoning nuclear weapons". Such act is viewed as illogical and contradictory in any aspect.
					
					 The U.S. demand for abandonment of nuclear weapons is not for the detente on the Korean Peninsula but for the attainment of the final goal in its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is seeking to disarm the DPRK and, furthermore, stifle it by force of arms.
					
					 It is evident to everyone that the DPRK can never accept the U.S. brigandish demand.
					
					 Now that the U.S. is forcing the DPRK to accept such unilateral demand and posing nuclear threat, the DPRK will never sit with the U.S. and even if such negotiations are held, there will be no solution to the issue. 
					
					 The U.S. had better stop at once such poor farce as deceiving and mocking at the world with the uninteresting issue of dialogue.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams Moves to Revive "Yusin" Dictatorship
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams Moves to Revive "Yusin" Dictatorship in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Intelligence Service's (IS) interference in political matters is being brought to light without let-up, touching off great anger among people from all walks of life in south Korea.
					 As already exposed, Won Se Hun and other high-ranking officials of the IS were directly involved in the operations to build up public opinion in favor of the "presidential" candidate from the "Saenuri Party" last year.
					
					 They termed those seeking reunification and progress "leftists following the north" and perpetrated political surveillance over the organizations and personages who opposed and criticized the project for four large rivers and conclusion of FTA with the U.S., putting pressure upon them in every aspect.
					
					 The IS interference in political issues is another "political coup" and "modern type witch hunt" for extending the fascist dictatorship in south Korea.
					
					 It is quite natural for the south Korean opposition parties and organizations of different social strata to brand the IS actions as a blatant challenge to democracy and strongly demand a comprehensive and widespread probe into those acts.
					
					 What maters is that the IS, much upset by this, claimed what it did was "just activities conducted as an intelligence agency" and "it was aimed to prevent the north and forces following it from interfering in south Korea's pending state affairs."
					
					 This is no more than sheer sophism to escape domestic and foreign public criticism and strengthen the fascist rule. It is an insult to the south Koreans as well as a provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 This goes to clearly prove that the present south Korean authorities claim they are "different" from the previous regime and they made "a switchover in its policy toward the north" but there is no change in essence.
					
					 As already known, the IS, successor to the Security Planning Board which followed in the footsteps of the Central Intelligence Agency in the period of ill-famed "yusin" dictatorship, revealed its true colors as a traitorous machine as soon as it made its appearance.
					
					 It is due to the operations of the IS that democratic rights, freedom and other rights of the south Korean people have been  ruthlessly trampled down and pro-reunification patriots and organizations harshly suppressed.
					
					 It is none other than the IS which has persecuted and punished south Koreans and progressive forces aspiring after independence, democracy and reunification, after terming them "the forces following the north" and it is again the IS which is getting frantic in the "human rights" racket against the DPRK and operations to scatter leaflets and abduct fellow countrymen of the north. It was IS gangsters who orchestrated the hideous scenarios for destroying statues of the great leaders in a bid to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 There was a regime change and the boss of the IS was replaced by another in south Korea but information-gathering and plot-breeding activities got intensified to strengthen dictatorship and escalate  confrontation.
					
					 This is evidenced by the fact that the guy who defiled the history of the mass patriotic struggle waged by south Koreans such as the popular uprising on Jeju Island was appointed as the boss of the IS under the patronage of the present authorities and the whirlwind for "eliminating the forces following the north" became more furious.
					
					 A series of spy cases such as "defectors from the north" which have been disclosed one after another bring to daylight the true colors of the IS as a center for hatching political plots and carrying out politically motivated terrorism.
					
					 It is an inevitability of history that the south Koreans from all walks of life are denouncing the present authorities and the IS for their moves to bring back the departed soul of the "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					 The situation proves once again that the south Koreans should disorganize the IS, the general headquarters of the fascist rule, in order to pave a wide avenue for achieving the reconciliation and unity of all Koreans.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage War Drills in Forefront Areas
articles.content:
S. Korea Plans to Stage War Drills in Forefront Areas 
						
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean metropolitan army corps plans to stage the Hwarang drill in Inchon and Kyonggi Province from May 6 to 10, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 To be involved in the drill are troops of the corps, civilians, administrative officials, police, reserve forces, etc.
					
					 Timed to coincide with the drill, the 17th Division of the puppet army also plans to a drill in Seoul and its vicinity allegedly to cope with infiltration from the north as part of its scenario to escalate the confrontation.

articles.title: Mongolian Centre for Study of Juche Registers Kim Jong Un as Honorary Chairman
articles.content:
Mongolian Centre for Study of Juche Registers Kim Jong Un as Honorary Chairman 
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The Mongolian Centre for the Study of Juche registered the dear respected Kim Jong Un as honorary chairman on the occasions of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) and the first anniversaries of Kim Jong Un's election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					  A decision to register Kim Jong Un as honorary chairman was adopted at a meeting of the Leadership Council of the Mongolian Centre for the Study of Juche on April 5.
					
					 The decision reflected the reverence of all the members of the center for Kim Jong Un, who is leading the Korean people's struggle to defend the sovereignty to the victory and steering the world political situation by successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed in Poland
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed in Poland
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The Polish website "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea" posted a special write-up on April 14, a day before the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 The special write-up, containing more than 30 photos of the President, noted in introduction:
					
					 April 15 of this year marks the 101st birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, great leader of the Korean people.
					
					 Kim Il Sung was a hero of the Korean nation who dedicated his life to the happiness of the people and the prosperity of the country.
					
					 He was also a master of politics who clearly indicated ways for world peace and independent development of humankind.
					
					 His exploits will always remain in the memory of the Korean people and all other people across the world.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Lauded by Int'l Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Lauded by Int'l Body
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain posted on its website One Korea Network articles illustrated with a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un on April 14.
					 An article titled "Great pluck jolting the earth" said many south Koreans are praising Kim Jong Un for successfully leading the Juche-oriented revolutionary cause of Songun with the spirit of Mt. Paektu, matchless courage and pluck.
					
					 Lots of media in south Korea conveyed the news report about Kim Jong Un's inspection tour of Panmunjom last year, commenting it as an event clearly showing his pluck and as an eye-opener to the south Korean public, the article noted.
					
					 In an article titled "Choice of DPRK" the website said the third underground nuclear test conducted by the DPRK was a decisive measure for self-defence to cope with the U.S. ferocious hostile act of wantonly infringing upon the a sovereign state's legitimate right to satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The moves of all the hostile forces against the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK have developed into a military offensive for aggression. Therefore, the DPRK's option has become clear.
					
					 It is an invariable stand of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to counter the enemies' daggers with long swords, their rifles with guns and their nuclear threat with stronger Korean-style precision nuclear strike means.

articles.title: KPA Anniversary Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
KPA Anniversary Celebrated in Different Countries
						
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- Meetings and film shows took place in Iran, Poland and Guinea on April 22 and 23 to celebrate the 81st anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Displayed at their venues were photos dealing with undying Songun leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Screened at the film shows were Korean films showing the invincible might of the KPA.
					
					 The manager of the Iran-Korea Friendship Magsal Agro-Stock Farm praised Kim Il Sung as a great politician and invincible strategist who made undying feats not only for the Korean revolution but for the cause of global independence.
					
					 The DPRK is standing firm against the U.S. thanks to the matchless grit and wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, who is successfully carrying forward the Songun cause of Kim Jong Il, who turned the DPRK into a military power with his Songun politics, he noted.
					
					 The chairman of the Tradition Association of the Polish People's Army said that the KPA will always remain invincible thanks to Kim Jong Un, who is identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: KPA Admired by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
KPA Admired by Foreign Papers
 Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers carried special write-ups from April 5 to 24 to mark the 81st anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The Russian paper Komsomolskaya Pravda devoted one whole page to a special write-up illustrated with a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un inspecting a KPA unit.
					
					 The special write-up is made up of articles and photos dealing with the invincible might of KPA, the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army.
					
					 In an article titled "KPA, army for people" it said that the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK founded by President Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea, defeated the formidable U.S. and Japanese imperialists. They also shattered the moves of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK and creditably defended the socialist country and people's security late in the last century, it noted.
					
					 It stressed that KPA regards army-people unity as its life and mode of existence.
					
					 The Lao paper Congtap Pasason Lao carried an article titled "Matchless KPA" illustrated with a photo showing KPA strong in the sense of organization and fighting capacity.
					
					 The article said that KPA has always been victorious in the acute confrontation with the imperialists, defending socialism and reliably guaranteeing the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper Natun Bangla and the Pakistani paper Baluchistan Times carried articles introducing KPA, which has won victories for decades under the leadership of the peerlessly great persons.

articles.title: IRP publica carta blanca sobre la crisis nuclear
articles.content:
IRP publica carta blanca sobre la crisis nuclear
						
Pyongyang, 2 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Instituto de la Reunificacion de la Patria (IRP) hizo publica el dia primero una carta blanca revelando que Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos son culpables de la agravacion de tension en la Peninsula Coreana y de la crisis de guerra nuclear.
					Debido a los actos provocadores de EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos, acontecieron de siglo en siglo los incidentes de enfrentamiento militar, que llevaron la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana a la fase de supertension y produjeron gran revuelo en el ambito mundial, comienza el texto y prosigue:
					
					A citar algunos ejemplos, la pasada guerra coreana en la decada de 1950, el incidente del barco espia armado "Pueblo", el de avion espia de gran tamano "EC-121" en la decada de 1960 y el de Phanmunjom en la decada de 1970, el de choque armado en el Mar Oeste y el de canonazos de la isla Yonphyong, etc.
					
					EE.UU. y las fuerzas hostiles inventaron la brutal "resolucion de sancion" de la ONU acusando el lanzamiento de satelite artificial con fines pacificos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea efectuado a finales del ano pasado y cometieron actos provocadores que violan flagrantemente la dignidad y la soberania de ella.
					
					Frente a ello, la RPDC, como ha advertido, respondio rotundamente a las provocaciones de EE.UU., el Sur de Corea y otras fuerzas hostiles con la tercera prueba nuclear subterranea.
					
					EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana fabricaron en marzo de 2013 otra "resolucion de sancion" no. 2094 contra la RPDC usando su herramienta de votacion de la ONU.
					
					La ultima resolucion, que ha recrudecido el caracter provocativo de la anterior "resolucion" no. 2087 de la ONU, es el documento de chantaje y de declaracion de guerra que persigue aislar y asfixiar a la RPDC bloqueandola por el aire, la tierra y el mar.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, los belicistas norteamericanos y los satelites surcoreanos libraron desde marzo pasado en el territorio surcoreano los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle".
					
					En el marco de esas maniobras, se realzaron los ejercicios para poner en practica el "OPLAN 5027" y "OPLAN 5029", planes de guerra que proponen asaltar y tomar a la RPDC.
					
					Los belicistas no ocultaron siquiera que los ejercicios militares tienen su enfoque en el ataque preventivo nuclear contra la RPDC y el ataque de precision a su dirigencia.
					
					Ademas, elaboraron el plan de destruir el simbolo de la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y realizaron el simulacro.
					
					El vocero del Pentagono, el comandante de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea y los gangsteres del circulo militar surcoreano dijeron abiertamente que los presentes ejercicios "suponen la guerra local y hasta la total" y son para "demostrar la capacidad de ataque nuclear", "atacar preventivamente las bases estrategicas del Norte de Corea y golpear, si este reacciona, hasta los focos de reaccion, las fuerzas de apoyo y las de mando".
					
					Por otra parte, la banda surcoreana y EE.UU. hicieron hecho consumado la intervencion de las tropas norteamericanas en los conflictos militares entre ambas partes coreanas al firmar el "plan de operaciones conjuntas para hacer frente a la provocacion local", libraron los ejercicios practicos segun el plan de guerra local y guerra total y los planes provocativos de distintos generos en las 5 islas del Mar Oeste y los publicaron con bombo y platillo.
					
					Los cabecillas del circulo militar de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea chismearon que "se preparan para las peores circunstancias", "pueden pasar a la fase de represalia durante el entrenamiento" y "no hay limites en la dimension de represalia".
					
					Para colmo, peroraron que exterminaran de la Tierra el regimen norcoreano.
					
					Todos los hechos revelan que los belicistas norteamericanos y los titeres surcoreanos son autores de la agravacion de tension y provocadores que trajeron la crisis de guerra nuclear a la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: CRPP condena a las autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
CRPP condena a las autoridades surcoreanas
						
Pyongyang, 2 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico el dia 2 la informacion no.1034 denunciando a las autoridades surcoreanas que entregan a las tropas norteamericanas los gastos de acampamento y hasta los personales.
					Recientemente, en el Sur de Corea causa gran escandalo el hecho de que las tropas agresivas norteamericanas malgastaron en los preparativos de guerra anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea gran cantidad de expensas recibidas por parte de las autoridades surcoreanas bajo el pretexto de "cuotas para la defensa" y los usan como los personales.
					
					Los crimenes de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea revelados otra vez suscitan la colera de los habitantes surcoreanos y todos los demas connacionales.
					
					Desde el ano 1989 los titeres surcoreanos entregan cada ano los enormes impuestos de los habitantes a las tropas norteamericanas como cuotas para su mantenimiento y su tamano se aumenta por la coaccion de EE.UU.
					
					Segun los datos publicados por los titeres, el tamano de las cuotas para el mantenimiento acumuladas por las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea sobrepasa hasta finales de 2010 a un billon 300 mil millones de wones. 
					
					No hay en este mundo otros elementos tan vendepatrias y proyanquis como las autoridades surcoreanas que suplican, pagando los gastos de acampamento y hasta los personales, el estacionamiento perpetuo de las tropas agresoras y ocupantes que se dedican al asesinato, bandidaje, saqueo y violacion sexual actuando como duenas del territorio ajeno.
					
					Es una verguenza de la nacion coreana la existencia de la banda de titeres surcoreanos que se enfrenta con la parte connacional y adula a su amo gringo abogando por fortalecer la alianza y sirviendo como lacayos de guerra y para colmo, regala a las tropas yanquis hasta el impuesto pagado con sangre por los habitantes surcoreanos.
					
					Todos los habitantes surcoreanos deberan levantarse en la lucha por expulsar cuanto antes a las tropas agresoras norteamericanas, causa de todas las desgracias y sufrimientos, y por eliminar a los traidores proyanquis.

articles.title: Ciudadano norteamericano condenado a 15 anos de trabajo reeducativo
articles.content:
Ciudadano norteamericano condenado a 15 anos de trabajo reeducativo
						
Pyongyang, 2 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el 30 de abril en el Tribunal Supremo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea el juicio sobre el ciudadano norteamericano Pae Jun Ho quien fue detenido cuando habia entrado el 3 de noviembre del ano pasado en la ciudad de Rason en condicion de turista.
					El tribunal sentencio a 15 anos de trabajo obligatorio al acusado por sus actos criminales y hostiles anti-RPDC.

articles.title: Exitos en administracion combinada de selvicultura y agricultura en Suan
articles.content:
Exitos en administracion combinada de selvicultura y agricultura en Suan
						
Pyongyang, 2 de mayo (ACNC) -- En el distrito de Suan de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se promueve activamente la administracion combinada de selvicultura y agricultura.
					El distrito de Suan, region montanosa cuenta con pocas tierras cultivables.
					
					En el tiempo pasado fueron deteriorados mucho los bosques por haberlos usado en resolver los alimentos, las lenas y las maderas necesarias.
					
					Desde el ano 2000, el distrito planto muchos arboles para convertir las artigas en los  bosques, pero no obtuvo los resultados merecidos.
					
					Bajo tal circunstancia, se presentaba como labor apremiante tomar el adecuado metodo de formacion forestal para convertir en bosques sembrando los cultivos en las artigas.
					
					Al cabo de varios debates, los funcionarios e investigadores del Ministerio de Proteccion Territorial y Ambiental llegaron a una conclusion de que era mas racional el metodo de administracion combinada de selvicultura y agricultura.
					
					Asi comenzaron a aplicar ese metodo de manera experimental.
					
					Para este fin, organizaron en la zona de cabeza distrital los 3 equipos de utilizacion de montana con las amas de casa y los ancianos que empleaban las artigas y los ampliaron gradualmente a varias regiones.
					
					Los equipos acondicionaron las almacigas y produjeron principalmente las posturas con que formaran los bosques de uso economico.
					
					Tomando en consideracion el estado de bosque y las demandas de los habitantes, escogieron adecuadamente tambien las zonas de lenas.
					
					En las zonas favorables a la cria de animales domesticos, formaron los herbazales naturales y artificiales.
					
					Gracias a tales medidas, se lograron muchos resultados.
					
					Aseguraron mas de 85% la proporcion de arraigo de los arboles al plantarlos en muchas areas e incrementaron en 1.5 veces la tasa de crecimiento.
					
					Tomaron la medida de proteger las tierras sembrando los arboles y formando las cintas de hierbas, con los cuales aumentaron el rendimiento de la cosecha de los cultivos y disminuyeron 50-70% la erosion de la tierra.
					
					A base de haber trazado el plan de recuperar los bosques aplicando el mencionado metodo, el distrito plantea completar la forestacion en un futuro cercano.
